channel.title: Kamloops Roofing Contractors | Roof Repairs | Inspection | Shingles |Soffit | Fascia Covers
channel.description: Our metal roofing company offers 100% protection from the harsh BC weather. We also offer quality soffit, roof shingles, fascia covers, roof repairs services and inspection for your Kamloops home. Call 250-571-1988
